III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
The youth center is located near a busy intersection in the southeast section of Ann
Arbor. The facility was designed and built utilizing a state-of-the-art electronic
monitoring and security system in its short-term secure program. The facility also
houses a day treatment program, a school operated by the local intermediate school
district, a large gymnasium and a fully functional court room/visitation room.
B. Program Description
The Washtenaw County Youth Center, under the auspices of the Children’s Services
Department of Washtenaw County Government, will provide a 24 hour secure, short-
term care for up to 40 accused or adjudicated delinquents and a full-day treatment
program for up to 30 delinquent youth and their families. The Family Division of the Trial
Court will make referrals to the programs.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
During the site visit of 1/17/03, there were no rule violations determined and it was
established that the institution has acceptable plans in place to achieve compliance
with applicable licensing rules.
